Jogo de dps mais jogado, o melhor

The review is not about recommending it or not, I just don't like having to wait after walking for getting proper aim and that there are missed shots at a distance of 2-3 meters many times, even with the most accurate weapons (and yes, even when standing still and crouching). I need to see how the opponent is moving, I don't want to play guess games due to lag and false lag issues (from each pov). Besides it's too simple once you can shoot well somewhat. But atleast it has replayability. These issues will probably never be addressed because they are actually part of how the game is, so it's just not for me. Won't take it too seriously I guess. Good for casual games
